title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 20.6 - Application for title only
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 20.6 - Application for title only

State Regulations

Where an application is made for a title only, the
appropriate procedures provided in section
20.5
shall be followed except that
the material shall be submitted directly to the Title Bureau, Department of

Motor Vehicles, South Mall, Albany, NY 12228. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
20.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
